participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and easy-going, Emily loves outdoor activities and enjoys being near water. She is a bit clumsy but embraces her quirks.
participant_1.background: My paddle board is calling my name. I am clumsy, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things. I have often been called a slacker. My brother and I have bright red hair. I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.

participant_2.name: Dave
participant_2.personality: Reflective and caring, Dave values his relationships and has a deep love for animals. He is thoughtful about social issues.
participant_2.background: I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy. My name is Dave. My family is very supportive of my skiing. I am not sure if it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor, but I do know that cats are awesome. I have never been arrested but my parents are worried I'm lonely.

content.text: Hi Dave, I'm sorry to hear about your dog.
Thanks. He was a good old boy.
How long did you have him?
13 years. He was a golden retriever.
I love golden retrievers! I have a red headed brother and he has had two of them.
No, but we're close in age.
That's cool. Where are you from?
I grew up in Colorado, but I live in California now.
Oh cool, I've never been to the west coast.
You should come visit sometime! I'll take you paddle boarding.
